records.QueryText: INFORMATION REGARDING FOR THE CONTROL OF RICE STEMBORER IN PADDY(JHONA) CROP?
records.KccAns: FOR THE CONTROL OF RICE STEMBORER IN PADDY(JHONA) CROP,PLS APPLY 5KG CARTAP HYDROCHLORIDE(PADAN) OR 4KG CHLORANTRANILIPROLE(FARTERA) PER ACRE.

records.QueryText: How to control weeds of Soybean?
records.KccAns: Foliar spray the solution of Imazethapyr 300ml/acer (Pursuit)  or Quizalofop- P- Ethyl ( Targa super) @ 1lit. /hac incorporate with chipko at the 20- 25 days old crop.
Dichlorvos 76% EC

records.QueryText: How to control root ort in chillies ?
records.KccAns: Drenching with Saaf @ 25 gm /10 liter of water .
